### Textbook Notes

```{r echo=FALSE}

pptx_location <- "/lecture_notes/Week 13/SSDS_Ch11_Ch12_pptx.zip"
docx_location <- "/lecture_notes/Week 13/SSDS_Ch11_Ch12_docx.zip"

powerpoint_link <- function() {
  paste0("<a href=\"", pptx_location, "\">", as.character(fa("file-powerpoint", fill = "#d04423", width = "2em")), "</a>")
}

word_link <- function() {
  paste0("<a href=\"", docx_location, "\">", as.character(fa("file-word", fill = "#00a4ef", width = "2em")), "</a>")
}

textitems <- tibble(
  
  pptx <- c("Chapters 11 & 12 PowerPoints",
               powerpoint_link()),
  
  docx <- c("Chapters 11 & 12 Notes",
            word_link())
  
)

```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
kable(textitems, 
      col.names = c("", ""),
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'cc') %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "20em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "20em") 
```

### R Walkthroughs

Download a copy of everything you need to follow along the walkthroughs^[You will have to unzip this file. If you are unfamiliar with this process, please check the [Unzipping files](/resource/unzipping/) section under Resources for assistance]

```{r echo=FALSE,eval=TRUE,message=FALSE,purl=FALSE}
loc <- here::here("static", "slides", "Descriptions", "EDP613RStatsMaterials.zip")

downloadthis::download_file(
  path = loc,
  output_name = "Descriptive and Tests Walkthrough Materials",
  button_label = "Download",
  button_type = "default",
  has_icon = TRUE,
  icon = "fa fa-save",
  class = "hvr-sweep-to-left"

```
